  âœ“ storeAuthData(token, user)     - Store both
  âœ“ getAuthToken()                  - Retrieve token
  âœ“ getUserData()                   - Retrieve user
  âœ“ clearAuthToken()                - Clear all (logout)
  âœ“ isAuthenticated()               - Check auth status

Context Hooks (context/AuthContext.tsx):
  âœ“ useAuth()                       - Main hook
  âœ“ useUserId()                     - Get user.id
  âœ“ useUserPhone()                  - Get user.phone_number

Context Methods:
  âœ“ login(token, user)              - Login & store
  âœ“ logout()                        - Logout & clear
  âœ“ updateUser(user)                - Update stored user
  âœ“ refreshAuth()                   - Reload from storage

if (isAuthenticated) {
  console.log('User ID:', user.id);
}

// Example 2: Quick user ID

  fetchUserData(userId);
}

// Example 3: Logout

await logout();
router.replace('/onboarding');

// Example 4: Update user

await updateUser({ ...user, name: 'John Doe' });
